long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter Screenshot Extension

Effortlessly capture and save Twitter tweets as high-quality images with the Twitter Screenshot Extension. This tool is perfect for preserving memorable tweets, sharing insightful threads, or archiving important information for later reference.

Features:

Easy Capture: Quickly generate images of tweets directly from your Twitter feed with just one click.
Light and Dark Modes: Choose between light and dark themes to match your preference or the original tweet's appearance.
High-Quality Images: Produce high-resolution images that retain the original formatting, including text, images, and links.
QR Code Integration: Automatically includes a QR code in the screenshot that links back to the original tweet for easy sharing and reference.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design ensures a seamless experience without any hassle.
Automatic Formatting: The extension preserves the tweet's layout, including the author's name, username, avatar, and content.
How to Use:

Install the Twitter Screenshot Extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to the tweet you wish to capture.
Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Select your preferred mode (Light or Dark).
Click the "Capture Tweet" button, and the image with an embedded QR code linking back to the tweet will be saved to your device.
Permissions Required:

Access to twitter.com to read and capture tweet content.
Support and Feedback:

We value your feedback! If you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, please contact us at [bigbowl.yuan@gmail.com].

Feel free to customize this description by adding any additional features or details specific to your extension. Good luck with your submission!
